name: The Dead Don't Sleep
description:
Controls

WASD to move. Left mouse to shoot/attack. Note, there is a twist when you die!

Limitations

We didn't get to implement ammo creates so you may run out of ammo. In future we would also like to implement more weapons etc too.

Story

In a dark and dystopic near-future, a group of soldiers is trying to survive in a now devastated world. This world is plagued with a disease that kills all humans, but death is only the beginning, as the lifeless corpses that are killed by the virus are being resurrected into zombies. Play as the group of humans in this action-based game to exterminate all zombies in the area. The twist is that if you play a human that gets killed by a zombie, you will join their team...
